name: Knitted Roller Skate Toe Guards
description: A very quick to knit and simple pattern to keep your skates looking fresh. Use whatever yarn you have but be mindful it’s not going to be the most robust protection, I do think that worked in garter they might be a little more hard wearing. To make them more robust you could work them in garter or with a denser fabric (i.e 3 strands of fingering weight yarn) Don’t forget this is a guide, feel free to add texture, be playful and add some colour to your skating. I think they would also look cute with a central cable.
full_text: A very quick to knit and simple pattern to keep your skates looking fresh. Use whatever yarn you have but be mindful it’s not going to be the most robust protection, I do think that worked in garter they might be a little more hard wearing. To make them more robust you could work them in garter or with a denser fabric (i.e 3 strands of fingering weight yarn) Don’t forget this is a guide, feel free to add texture, be playful and add some colour to your skating. I think they would also look cute with a central cable. Don’t forget to be sensible, if they show too much signs of wear or stretching please replace! Never put yourself or others at risk! Since this is not a formal pattern, this has NOT been tech edited. Please do let me know of any errors and I will update as soon as I can! If you’d like to support more things like this and my channel feel free head to my Ko-Fi https://ko-fi.com/heatherandhops
